tool.name: CalculateScenicInventoryValues

param.name: viewedLandscapes
param.dialogReference: Viewed landscapes feature class to update. (Use Create Viewed Landscape Polygons tool).
param.pythonReference: Viewed landscapes feature class to update. (Use Create Viewed Landscape Polygons tool).

param.name: sivSource
param.dialogReference:
The Enjoy the View master database.

Use Database Connections\ETV_on_INP2300FCVWHIS1_Report_Data_Reader.sde
param.pythonReference:
The Enjoy the View master database.

Use Database Connections\ETV_on_INP2300FCVWHIS1_Report_Data_Reader.sde

tool.summary: Using viewed landscape polygon feature class, adds attributes for scenic quality and view importance ratings, and scenic inventory value. Populates these attributes using information from the Enjoy the View master database. Also, adds blank placeholder fields for composite scenic inventory value and composite scenic inventory ranking.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Using viewed landscape polygon feature class, adds attributes for scenic quality and view importance ratings, and scenic inventory value. Populates these attributes using information from the Enjoy the View master database. Also, adds blank placeholder fields for composite scenic inventory value and composite scenic inventory ranking.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: NPS Inventory and Monitoring Division, NPS Air Resources Division
